text: Isa bin Maryam ne dua ki ke aye Allah aye hamaare parvardigaar! hum par asmaan se khaana naazil farma ke wo hamaare liye yaani hum mein jo awwal hai aur jo baadh mein hai sab ke liye ek khushi ki baath ho jaaye aur teri taraf se ek nishaani ho jaaye aur tu hum ko rizkh ata farma de aur tu sab ata karne waalo se accha hai
